text: The UK, Australia and the USA are forming a new trilateral defence partnership that will preserve security and stability around the world.  It will also create hundreds of high-skilled jobs across the country, driving forward our levelling up agenda.  #AUKUS https://t.co/W1MibdaBDc
english: The UK, Australia and the USA are forming a new trilateral defence partnership that will preserve security and stability around the world.  It will also create hundreds of high-skilled jobs across the country, driving forward our levelling up agenda.  #AUKUS https://t.co/W1MibdaBDc

text: The Cabinet I have appointed today will work tirelessly to unite and level up the whole country.   We will build back better from the pandemic and deliver on your priorities.   Now let’s get on with the job.
english: The Cabinet I have appointed today will work tirelessly to unite and level up the whole country.   We will build back better from the pandemic and deliver on your priorities.   Now let’s get on with the job.

text: 1/ The pandemic is far from over, but thanks to our phenomenal vaccine programme, new treatments and testing, we are able to live with the virus without significant restrictions on our freedoms.  Our autumn and winter plan sets out how we will manage COVID-19.
english: 1/ The pandemic is far from over, but thanks to our phenomenal vaccine programme, new treatments and testing, we are able to live with the virus without significant restrictions on our freedoms.  Our autumn and winter plan sets out how we will manage COVID-19.

text: Great to meet smart energy apprentices at @BritishGas this morning.  Our #PlanForJobs invests in young people and gives them the high-tech skills they need for the careers of the future. https://t.co/M35TUJbGKZ
english: Great to meet smart energy apprentices at @BritishGas this morning.  Our #PlanForJobs invests in young people and gives them the high-tech skills they need for the careers of the future. https://t.co/M35TUJbGKZ

text: Early diagnosis is critical to beating cancer.   The NHS's world-leading trial of a potentially life-saving blood test that detects cancer before symptoms appear could be revolutionary in our battle against a disease that claims the lives of so many.  https://t.co/l1iam7zhF5
english: Early diagnosis is critical to beating cancer.   The NHS's world-leading trial of a potentially life-saving blood test that detects cancer before symptoms appear could be revolutionary in our battle against a disease that claims the lives of so many.  https://t.co/l1iam7zhF5

text: Our #PlanForJobs is working.  Unemployment is falling.  The economy is recovering.  We will continue to support people into work, ensure they get the skills they need to get good jobs and help businesses fill their vacancies. https://t.co/iWB0SxVyBA
english: Our #PlanForJobs is working.  Unemployment is falling.  The economy is recovering.  We will continue to support people into work, ensure they get the skills they need to get good jobs and help businesses fill their vacancies. https://t.co/iWB0SxVyBA

text: This summer, our @TeamGB and @ParalympicsGB athletes have showcased the very best of our country with sportsmanship, hard work and determination. english: What a sensational match! Huge congratulations to @EmmaRaducanu    You showed extraordinary skill, poise and guts and we are all hugely proud of you.  #USOpen

text: Today we remember the 2,977 people taken from us on September 11th 2001.  But while the terrorists imposed their burden of grief and suffering, we can now say with the perspective of 20 years that they failed to shake our belief in freedom and democracy. https://t.co/BBuz9i08WZ
english: Today we remember the 2,977 people taken from us on September 11th 2001.  But while the terrorists imposed their burden of grief and suffering, we can now say with the perspective of 20 years that they failed to shake our belief in freedom and democracy. https://t.co/BBuz9i08WZ

text: Excellent discussion with Chilean President @sebastianpinera at Downing Street today. As Chile passes the baton of the @COP26 Presidency to the UK, I look forward to continuing to work together to drive forward ambitious climate action ahead of November’s summit.  https://t.co/O5R4muFaBp
english: Excellent discussion with Chilean President @sebastianpinera at Downing Street today. As Chile passes the baton of the @COP26 Presidency to the UK, I look forward to continuing to work together to drive forward ambitious climate action ahead of November’s summit.  https://t.co/O5R4muFaBp

english: Today is #WorldSuicidePreventionDay.  For help and support, visit: https://t.co/gpuH968pxt https://t.co/pNRIZSxe47

text: It’s fantastic that our NHS has secured early access to the breakthrough, life-saving cancer drug Sotorasib, initially for lung cancer.  This drug can stop tumour growth, making a huge difference to patients and boosting our efforts to get people the treatment they need.
english: It’s fantastic that our NHS has secured early access to the breakthrough, life-saving cancer drug Sotorasib, initially for lung cancer.  This drug can stop tumour growth, making a huge difference to patients and boosting our efforts to get people the treatment they need.

text: Well done @EmmaRaducanu for a brilliant win at the #USOpen. The whole country will be cheering you on in the final.
english: Well done @EmmaRaducanu for a brilliant win at the #USOpen. The whole country will be cheering you on in the final.

text: We’re accelerating the transition to zero-emission vehicles. As we mark World EV Day, it’s fantastic to see our bold and innovative plans in action across government and industry to make it easier for people to go electric and get the country building back greener. https://t.co/wvYc34dvpf
english: We’re accelerating the transition to zero-emission vehicles. As we mark World EV Day, it’s fantastic to see our bold and innovative plans in action across government and industry to make it easier for people to go electric and get the country building back greener. https://t.co/wvYc34dvpf

text: On #999Day, we honour those who work & volunteer to keep us safe and well, 24 hours a day, 7 days a week.   In the last 18 months emergency services have faced unprecedented challenges.   I know I speak on behalf of the whole country when I say thank you, we are immensely proud.
english: On #999Day, we honour those who work & volunteer to keep us safe and well, 24 hours a day, 7 days a week.   In the last 18 months emergency services have faced unprecedented challenges.   I know I speak on behalf of the whole country when I say thank you, we are immensely proud.

text: A phenomenal win by @EmmaRaducanu to reach the #USOpen semi-finals.  Best of luck in tonight's match, we are all behind you! https://t.co/jSTUT2FGw0
english: A phenomenal win by @EmmaRaducanu to reach the #USOpen semi-finals.  Best of luck in tonight's match, we are all behind you! https://t.co/jSTUT2FGw0

text: We will do what is right, reasonable and fair, we’ll make up the COVID backlogs, we’ll fund more nurses and, I hope, we will remove the anxiety of millions of families up and down the land by taking forward reforms that have been delayed for far too long. https://t.co/cwHWM95IVz
english: We will do what is right, reasonable and fair, we’ll make up the COVID backlogs, we’ll fund more nurses and, I hope, we will remove the anxiety of millions of families up and down the land by taking forward reforms that have been delayed for far too long. https://t.co/cwHWM95IVz

text: Our mission is to tackle the NHS COVID backlogs and fix social care at the same time.    That's what this levy will do – this is the right, reasonable, and responsible course of action.  https://t.co/1JTIi3vjNa https://t.co/pbqwcKkiUo
english: Our mission is to tackle the NHS COVID backlogs and fix social care at the same time.    That's what this levy will do – this is the right, reasonable, and responsible course of action.  https://t.co/1JTIi3vjNa https://t.co/pbqwcKkiUo

text: 1: As we repair the damage of the pandemic, we need to protect our NHS and address the problems in social care that successive governments have ducked for decades.  We’re taking necessary, responsible and fair action to protect our NHS and ensure dignity and security in old age. https://t.co/JnIGfvKzbY
english: 1: As we repair the damage of the pandemic, we need to protect our NHS and address the problems in social care that successive governments have ducked for decades.  We’re taking necessary, responsible and fair action to protect our NHS and ensure dignity and security in old age. https://t.co/JnIGfvKzbY

english: WATCH LIVE: Press conference on health and the future of social care  https://t.co/5tpqDvjuKc

english: WATCH LIVE: I set out our plan for Health and Social Care. https://t.co/taqh5TUN63

text: 1: The NHS cared for us when we needed it most, during the worst pandemic in a century.  Today I will set out my plan to ensure the NHS has the long term funding it needs so that we can help our NHS as it helped us.
english: 1: The NHS cared for us when we needed it most, during the worst pandemic in a century.  Today I will set out my plan to ensure the NHS has the long term funding it needs so that we can help our NHS as it helped us.

text: Those who served in Afghanistan fulfilled the first duty of the British Armed Forces - to keep our people safe - and they and their families should take pride in everything they did.  We will do right by our veterans   https://t.co/6Vh45eSIvI https://t.co/1NW06KIZL3
english: Those who served in Afghanistan fulfilled the first duty of the British Armed Forces - to keep our people safe - and they and their families should take pride in everything they did.  We will do right by our veterans   https://t.co/6Vh45eSIvI https://t.co/1NW06KIZL3

english: WATCH LIVE: my statement on Afghanistan https://t.co/YFM2Pnctji

text: Wishing Jewish people everywhere a good and sweet new year.  Shana Tova! https://t.co/z4BZ6v5GlU
english: Wishing Jewish people everywhere a good and sweet new year.  Shana Tova! https://t.co/z4BZ6v5GlU

text: I would like to thank the Japanese people for playing such fantastic hosts to our Olympic and Paralympic teams this summer. The challenges of COVID have not been easy, but you have brought people and nations together and inspired millions to get active. Thank you!
english: I would like to thank the Japanese people for playing such fantastic hosts to our Olympic and Paralympic teams this summer. The challenges of COVID have not been easy, but you have brought people and nations together and inspired millions to get active. Thank you!

text: It's been a history-making Games for @ParalympicsGB, who reached the podium in more sports than any other nation.   124 medals, 41 golds and second in the medal count.   Thank you for inspiring us. #ImpossibleToIgnore  https://t.co/U9iQfXfCJD
english: It's been a history-making Games for @ParalympicsGB, who reached the podium in more sports than any other nation.   124 medals, 41 golds and second in the medal count.   Thank you for inspiring us. #ImpossibleToIgnore  https://t.co/U9iQfXfCJD

text: Our Armed Forces stand ready to defend the UK and advance our objectives at home and abroad.  I’m deeply grateful to all who serve – they represent the very best of this country  https://t.co/rDGenx0oL8
english: Our Armed Forces stand ready to defend the UK and advance our objectives at home and abroad.  I’m deeply grateful to all who serve – they represent the very best of this country  https://t.co/rDGenx0oL8

text: It is completely unacceptable that @England players were racially abused in Hungary last night.   I urge @FIFAcom to take strong action against those responsible to ensure that this kind of disgraceful behaviour is eradicated from the game for good.
english: It is completely unacceptable that @England players were racially abused in Hungary last night.   I urge @FIFAcom to take strong action against those responsible to ensure that this kind of disgraceful behaviour is eradicated from the game for good.

text: The courage and professionalism of our Armed Forces was on full display during the evacuation operation in Afghanistan, which lifted 15,000 people to safety.  They are the best of the best  https://t.co/bedmQ5XvTk
english: The courage and professionalism of our Armed Forces was on full display during the evacuation operation in Afghanistan, which lifted 15,000 people to safety.  They are the best of the best  https://t.co/bedmQ5XvTk

text: Racing into the record books – congratulations @DameSarahStorey! https://t.co/pedwkIHyJ3
english: Racing into the record books – congratulations @DameSarahStorey! https://t.co/pedwkIHyJ3

text: Delighted @NHSEngland have struck a deal on this game-changing cholesterol drug. Not only will it benefit hundreds of thousands of patients by preventing heart attacks and strokes, but it is also another example of Britain as a life sciences superpower.  https://t.co/c5gdDH5td5
english: Delighted @NHSEngland have struck a deal on this game-changing cholesterol drug. Not only will it benefit hundreds of thousands of patients by preventing heart attacks and strokes, but it is also another example of Britain as a life sciences superpower.  https://t.co/c5gdDH5td5

text: Our country has a proud history of helping those in need. We will prove that once again through our support for the Afghan people we’ve welcomed to the UK. https://t.co/3ZU05vOYbM
english: Our country has a proud history of helping those in need. We will prove that once again through our support for the Afghan people we’ve welcomed to the UK. https://t.co/3ZU05vOYbM

text: Tonight’s UN Security Council resolution, led by the UK with our allies, makes clear that the international community stands with Afghans.  There can be no return to repression or terror. We will push as one voice for safe passage, humanitarian access & respect for human rights.
english: Tonight’s UN Security Council resolution, led by the UK with our allies, makes clear that the international community stands with Afghans.  There can be no return to repression or terror. We will push as one voice for safe passage, humanitarian access & respect for human rights.

text: My letter to all those who served in Afghanistan.  Whether you are still serving or a veteran, a loved-one, a relation or a friend, you all played your part and you should feel immense pride. https://t.co/Foy5r41Mcr
english: My letter to all those who served in Afghanistan.  Whether you are still serving or a veteran, a loved-one, a relation or a friend, you all played your part and you should feel immense pride. https://t.co/Foy5r41Mcr

text: On the end of military operations in Afghanistan. https://t.co/sOeXjeYtIr
english: On the end of military operations in Afghanistan. https://t.co/sOeXjeYtIr

text: Operation PITTING is a mission unlike anything we have seen in our lifetime, helping 15,000 people to safety in just under two weeks.   I want to thank everyone involved and the thousands of those who served over the last two decades. You can be proud of what you have achieved. https://t.co/2RTrsuDOb7
english: Operation PITTING is a mission unlike anything we have seen in our lifetime, helping 15,000 people to safety in just under two weeks.   I want to thank everyone involved and the thousands of those who served over the last two decades. You can be proud of what you have achieved. https://t.co/2RTrsuDOb7

text: This has been an operation of unprecedented pace and scale. Thank you for everyone who has contributed to the amazing effort. https://t.co/Hg6JrjSPUh
english: This has been an operation of unprecedented pace and scale. Thank you for everyone who has contributed to the amazing effort. https://t.co/Hg6JrjSPUh

text: The tragic loss of two UK nationals and the child of a UK national underlines the urgency of our evacuation effort and the bravery of everyone involved.  We will continue to move heaven and earth to get people out and to safety. https://t.co/8VjWbxaOxK
english: The tragic loss of two UK nationals and the child of a UK national underlines the urgency of our evacuation effort and the bravery of everyone involved.  We will continue to move heaven and earth to get people out and to safety. https://t.co/8VjWbxaOxK

text: The UK has always been a generous and compassionate country, and I’m proud of how our officials, Armed Forces, charities and local communities have responded in the last few weeks to the situation in Afghanistan. https://t.co/jSAx0rNhoY
english: The UK has always been a generous and compassionate country, and I’m proud of how our officials, Armed Forces, charities and local communities have responded in the last few weeks to the situation in Afghanistan. https://t.co/jSAx0rNhoY

text: Operation PITTING has been evacuating people from Afghanistan at an unprecedented scale and pace.   Thank you to everyone involved in this operation. We continue to do everything we can to help those to whom we owe a debt of honour. https://t.co/vdHngT07Gg
english: Operation PITTING has been evacuating people from Afghanistan at an unprecedented scale and pace.   Thank you to everyone involved in this operation. We continue to do everything we can to help those to whom we owe a debt of honour. https://t.co/vdHngT07Gg

text: I utterly condemn the barbaric terrorist attack in Kabul in which Afghans and members of the US military lost their lives.  The threat of terrorist attack is one of the constraints we’ve been operating under, but our evacuation effort continues with over 12,000 extracted so far. https://t.co/DXCFPj9KQC
english: I utterly condemn the barbaric terrorist attack in Kabul in which Afghans and members of the US military lost their lives.  The threat of terrorist attack is one of the constraints we’ve been operating under, but our evacuation effort continues with over 12,000 extracted so far. https://t.co/DXCFPj9KQC

english: An incredible achievement. Congratulations @DameSarahStorey! https://t.co/ZaNYov77Fz

english: I'm very proud of our incredible Armed Forces who are working flat out to support the evacuation operation in Kabul. https://t.co/3TWoS9J9ZR

text: Today the @G7 committed to work together on the immediate evacuation effort to ensure this continues safely.  We also agreed we must have a shared roadmap for engaging with the Taliban that aims to preserve the progress of the last 20 years. https://t.co/YciNnWYtaP
english: Today the @G7 committed to work together on the immediate evacuation effort to ensure this continues safely.  We also agreed we must have a shared roadmap for engaging with the Taliban that aims to preserve the progress of the last 20 years. https://t.co/YciNnWYtaP

text: Good luck to our brilliant and inspirational Paralympians!  https://t.co/N0I8M8wm47
english: Good luck to our brilliant and inspirational Paralympians!  https://t.co/N0I8M8wm47

text: I want to wish our brilliant Paralympians the very best of luck as the Tokyo Paralympic Games kick off today.  We’re all willing you on. Go for Gold @ParalympicsGB!  https://t.co/enEN4wF7w9
english: I want to wish our brilliant Paralympians the very best of luck as the Tokyo Paralympic Games kick off today.  We’re all willing you on. Go for Gold @ParalympicsGB!  https://t.co/enEN4wF7w9

text: Today I will hold an emergency @G7 meeting to coordinate our response to the crisis in Afghanistan.  I will ask our friends and allies to stand by the Afghan people and step up support for refugees and humanitarian aid.
english: Today I will hold an emergency @G7 meeting to coordinate our response to the crisis in Afghanistan.  I will ask our friends and allies to stand by the Afghan people and step up support for refugees and humanitarian aid.

text: Young people continue to be hospitalised with COVID-19.   Many of those becoming seriously ill are unvaccinated.   If you haven't done so already, please get your jabs as soon as you can.   https://t.co/HFdDcrX3l4 https://t.co/0zePXnbDLX
english: Young people continue to be hospitalised with COVID-19.   Many of those becoming seriously ill are unvaccinated.   If you haven't done so already, please get your jabs as soon as you can.   https://t.co/HFdDcrX3l4 https://t.co/0zePXnbDLX

text: I will convene G7 leaders on Tuesday for urgent talks on the situation in Afghanistan. It is vital that the international community works together to ensure safe evacuations, prevent a humanitarian crisis and support the Afghan people to secure the gains of the last 20 years.
english: I will convene G7 leaders on Tuesday for urgent talks on the situation in Afghanistan. It is vital that the international community works together to ensure safe evacuations, prevent a humanitarian crisis and support the Afghan people to secure the gains of the last 20 years.

text: An update on the situation in Afghanistan. https://t.co/kRz5Bvkfb3
english: An update on the situation in Afghanistan. https://t.co/kRz5Bvkfb3

text: Today I met a few of the Afghan former staff who have been resettled in the UK with their families.  They worked side-by-side with us and we stood by them and ensured their safety.  We're working tirelessly to help those in the country to whom we owe a debt of obligation. https://t.co/jSuqDx6VDK
english: Today I met a few of the Afghan former staff who have been resettled in the UK with their families.  They worked side-by-side with us and we stood by them and ensured their safety.  We're working tirelessly to help those in the country to whom we owe a debt of obligation. https://t.co/jSuqDx6VDK

text: We owe the brave people who worked side-by-side with us in Afghanistan a debt of gratitude.  I’m proud to see our resettlement scheme welcoming Afghans safely to our shores.  We’re working to get as many people out of Afghanistan as possible in the coming days. https://t.co/OKGvkBdqbx
english: We owe the brave people who worked side-by-side with us in Afghanistan a debt of gratitude.  I’m proud to see our resettlement scheme welcoming Afghans safely to our shores.  We’re working to get as many people out of Afghanistan as possible in the coming days. https://t.co/OKGvkBdqbx

text: Good news that @MHRAgovuk has approved the first therapeutic treatment designed specifically for COVID-19.   Alongside our life-saving vaccine programme, this will be an important weapon in fighting COVID, particularly for those who are immunocompromised.  https://t.co/6WaOKxbqKB
english: Good news that @MHRAgovuk has approved the first therapeutic treatment designed specifically for COVID-19.   Alongside our life-saving vaccine programme, this will be an important weapon in fighting COVID, particularly for those who are immunocompromised.  https://t.co/6WaOKxbqKB

text: We must help the people of Afghanistan choose the best of all their possible futures.  That is the critical task on which this government – working alongside our friends and partners around the world – is now urgently engaged. https://t.co/4CVDLEfRVk
english: We must help the people of Afghanistan choose the best of all their possible futures.  That is the critical task on which this government – working alongside our friends and partners around the world – is now urgently engaged. https://t.co/4CVDLEfRVk

text: We have an enduring commitment to the Afghan people, and we will honour it.  A new resettlement scheme will create a safe and legal route for those in most need to come and live safely in the UK.
english: We have an enduring commitment to the Afghan people, and we will honour it.  A new resettlement scheme will create a safe and legal route for those in most need to come and live safely in the UK.

text: Today's jobs figures are encouraging, showing signs of recovery across the country with employment up and unemployment down.  There is still work to do but our #PlanForJobs will give people the skills and experience they need to get back into work.  https://t.co/XW64Lopp68
english: Today's jobs figures are encouraging, showing signs of recovery across the country with employment up and unemployment down.  There is still work to do but our #PlanForJobs will give people the skills and experience they need to get back into work.  https://t.co/XW64Lopp68

english: An update on the situation in Afghanistan. https://t.co/26BtPrlic4

text: On #VJDay76 we honour and remember the many British, Commonwealth and Allied personnel who served in the Far East and Pacific, often in unthinkable conditions.   They fought for freedom, brought the Second World War to an end and restored peace and prosperity to the world. https://t.co/DphDIU2pSy
english: On #VJDay76 we honour and remember the many British, Commonwealth and Allied personnel who served in the Far East and Pacific, often in unthinkable conditions.   They fought for freedom, brought the Second World War to an end and restored peace and prosperity to the world. https://t.co/DphDIU2pSy

text: It was a pleasure to visit the @RAFMuseum this week, where I was shown the medals awarded to my grandfather Wilfred for his service in the Second World War.   The bravery and sacrifice of the wartime generation will never be forgotten. https://t.co/w4DQgEEEEL
english: It was a pleasure to visit the @RAFMuseum this week, where I was shown the medals awarded to my grandfather Wilfred for his service in the Second World War.   The bravery and sacrifice of the wartime generation will never be forgotten. https://t.co/w4DQgEEEEL

text: On the fourth anniversary of Anoosheh Ashoori’s wrongful detention in Iran, I reiterate my call for Iran to do the right thing and release him immediately.  Anoosheh and the other British nationals unjustly imprisoned in Iran must be able to return to their families in the UK.
english: On the fourth anniversary of Anoosheh Ashoori’s wrongful detention in Iran, I reiterate my call for Iran to do the right thing and release him immediately.  Anoosheh and the other British nationals unjustly imprisoned in Iran must be able to return to their families in the UK.

text: Thanks to UK donations, 3 million of the world’s most vulnerable will now have access to Covid vaccinations.   They join over 1 billion people around the world who have been protected by the Oxford-AstraZeneca vaccine.   The UK will continue to be a leading supporter of COVAX. https://t.co/1r6aJojYYg
english: Thanks to UK donations, 3 million of the world’s most vulnerable will now have access to Covid vaccinations. english: My thoughts are with the friends and family of those who lost their lives and with all those affected by the tragic incident in Plymouth last night. I thank the emergency services for their response.

english: Fantastic that 70% of adults under 30 have come forward to get vaccinated.  Please get your jab if you haven't already. It is our best route to beating the virus and getting back to the things we love. https://t.co/NPfkD7dWIs

There will be challenges ahead, but our successful vaccination programme and #PlanForJobs combined with the strength and resilience of the British people puts the UK in a strong position as we #BuildBackBetter from the pandemic. https://t.co/ALCuyVqFob

english: A massive congratulations to everyone who is receiving their GCSE results today. https://t.co/Vhnm3zW6DX

english: Inspiring to see the @RevivalOcean 2020 team cross the finish line of their epic 3,700 mile row from New York to London.  You've done this country proud and raised huge funds for @oceangen_ and @theRMcharity in the process.  Congratulations.

text: Our incredible vaccine rollout has now provided protection to 3/4 of UK adults.   We should be proud of this huge national achievement. english: Congratulations to @antonioguterres on his re-election as Secretary-General of the United Nations.   I look forward to continuing to work closely together as we tackle climate change at COP26 and build back better, fairer and greener from the pandemic.

text: Thank you to the Taskforce for Innovation, Growth and Regulatory Reform for their independent report on how the UK can reshape regulation and make best use of our rediscovered freedoms. text: Today marks five years since the tragic murder of Jo Cox. I want to pay tribute to her memory and my thoughts, along with I'm sure those of the rest of the country, are with all her family and friends.
english: Today marks five years since the tragic murder of Jo Cox. I want to pay tribute to her memory and my thoughts, along with I'm sure those of the rest of the country, are with all her family and friends.

text: Today marks a new dawn in the UK's relationship with Australia, underpinned by our shared history and common values    Our free trade agreement opens up fantastic opportunities for British businesses and consumers, as well as young people wanting to work and live Down Under. https://t.co/M59XhW5DvT

I want to reiterate the importance of getting both doses to give you maximum protection against COVID. Please book your jabs when you are eligible to do so. https://t.co/9OPPsVftbR

text: Disgraceful to see the hounding of Nick Watt doing his job.  The media must be able to report the facts without fear or favour – they are the lifeblood of our democracy.
english: Disgraceful to see the hounding of Nick Watt doing his job.  The media must be able to report the facts without fear or favour – they are the lifeblood of our democracy.

english: The deal is done!  https://t.co/vlgjJqxTUk

text: We have faced a very difficult choice. We can simply keep going with all of Step 4 on 21 June even though there is a real possibility that the virus will outrun the vaccines and that thousands more deaths would ensue that could otherwise have been avoided. Or... 1/4

text: .@NATO has underpinned the world's stability for over 70 years, protecting a billion people and our way of life. As we build back from the pandemic, I have every confidence it will continue to be the bedrock of global defence for generations to come.   #WeAreNATO https://t.co/bUvEHosBbc

text: Today we remember the 72 lives lost in the Grenfell tragedy four years ago. My thoughts are with the survivors, the bereaved and the wider community affected by this devastating fire.  This government is committed to ensuring this never happens again.
english: Today we remember the 72 lives lost in the Grenfell tragedy four years ago. My thoughts are with the survivors, the bereaved and the wider community affected by this devastating fire.  This government is committed to ensuring this never happens again.

text: On behalf of the UK, I offer my congratulations to @naftalibennett and @yairlapid on forming a new government in Israel.   As we emerge from COVID-19, this is an exciting time for the UK and Israel to continue working together to advance peace and prosperity for all.
english: On behalf of the UK, I offer my congratulations to @naftalibennett and @yairlapid on forming a new government in Israel.   As we emerge from COVID-19, this is an exciting time for the UK and Israel to continue working together to advance peace and prosperity for all.

text: I’m very pleased to announce that @G7 leaders have pledged over 1 billion doses to the world’s poorest countries – another big step towards vaccinating the world.  This weekend the @G7 came together. And together we are building back better, greener and fairer from the pandemic. https://t.co/ENpgnIpTj3

text: As Sir David Attenborough says, we have the skills to tackle climate change, but we need the global will.  That’s why I’m urging @G7 countries to drive a global Green Industrial Revolution to help developing nations reap the benefits of clean growth as we #BuildBackGreener. https://t.co/7ommNfnfoh
english: As Sir David Attenborough says, we have the skills to tackle climate change, but we need the global will.  That’s why I’m urging @G7 countries to drive a global Green Industrial Revolution to help developing nations reap the benefits of clean growth as we #BuildBackGreener. https://t.co/7ommNfnfoh

text: There is a direct relationship between reducing emissions, restoring nature, creating jobs and ensuring long-term economic growth.  The @G7 has an unprecedented opportunity to drive a global Green Industrial Revolution and transform the way we live.  #BuildBackGreener
english: There is a direct relationship between reducing emissions, restoring nature, creating jobs and ensuring long-term economic growth.  The @G7 has an unprecedented opportunity to drive a global Green Industrial Revolution and transform the way we live.  #BuildBackGreener

text: The #CarbisBayDeclaration marks a proud and historic moment for us all.  Under this agreement, the world's leading democracies will commit to preventing a global pandemic from ever happening again, ensuring the devastation caused by COVID-19 is never repeated.
english: The #CarbisBayDeclaration marks a proud and historic moment for us all.  Under this agreement, the world's leading democracies will commit to preventing a global pandemic from ever happening again, ensuring the devastation caused by COVID-19 is never repeated.

text: The Queen’s Birthday Honours allow us to pay tribute to all those who have gone above and beyond in their service to this country.  We should take heart from the stories of those receiving honours today and be inspired by their courage and kindness. https://t.co/a5VPOSo2dx
english: The Queen’s Birthday Honours allow us to pay tribute to all those who have gone above and beyond in their service to this country.  We should take heart from the stories of those receiving honours today and be inspired by their courage and kindness. https://t.co/a5VPOSo2dx

text: My fellow @G7 leaders and I were honoured to join Her Majesty The Queen and members of the @RoyalFamily at the @EdenProject this evening.   This wonderful place is a showcase for the beauty of the natural world, which we are all committed to preserving for future generations. https://t.co/hIxcvafWiv

text: The best way to lift countries out of poverty and lead a global recovery is to invest in education – particularly girls’ education.  The UK will donate £430m to help get children in the classroom, and I'm calling on other countries, including those at the @G7, to play their part.
english: The best way to lift countries out of poverty and lead a global recovery is to invest in education – particularly girls’ education.  The UK will donate £430m to help get children in the classroom, and I'm calling on other countries, including those at the @G7, to play their part.

text: An exciting day for football fans with the kick off of #Euro2020 – thousands of supporters will be in the stands at @WembleyStadium and @HampdenPark to watch some of the games unfold.   I want to wish @England, @ScotlandNT and @Cymru all the very best of luck.
english: An exciting day for football fans with the kick off of #Euro2020 – thousands of supporters will be in the stands at @WembleyStadium and @HampdenPark to watch some of the games unfold.   I want to wish @England, @ScotlandNT and @Cymru all the very best of luck.

english: Many congratulations to The Duke and; Duchess of Sussex on the birth of their daughter.

text: As General Eisenhower said, when Allied troops landed on Normandy’s beaches that June morning in 1944 the eyes of the world were upon them. The hopes and prayers of liberty-loving people everywhere marched with them.   77 years on, we thank and remember them. #DDay https://t.co/9gLdoHiH7s

english: At the @G7 next week, I will ask my fellow leaders to help vaccinate the world by the end of next year.   We have a responsibility to do everything we can to defeat COVID around the world.

text: My thoughts today are with the families of those who lost their lives and all those affected by the cowardly terrorist attack at London Bridge four years ago.   Today, as then, we stand united and resolute against terrorism and the dangerous ideology that inspires it.
english: My thoughts today are with the families of those who lost their lives and all those affected by the cowardly terrorist attack at London Bridge four years ago.   Today, as then, we stand united and resolute against terrorism and the dangerous ideology that inspires it.

text: The video of Roman Protasevich makes for deeply distressing viewing.  As a journalist and a passionate believer in freedom of speech I call for his immediate release.  Belarus' actions will have consequences.
english: The video of Roman Protasevich makes for deeply distressing viewing.  As a journalist and a passionate believer in freedom of speech I call for his immediate release.  Belarus' actions will have consequences.

text: 60 million vaccine doses have been given to adults across the UK.  Jab by jab this life-saving programme, unparalleled in our history, is getting us back to the things we love. english: I am deeply moved by the surge of support the British people have provided to the people of India and am pleased the UK Government has been able to play our part in providing life-saving assistance.  The UK will always be there for India in its time of need. https://t.co/RQdiZZJyxl

text: 15 million people across our United Kingdom have received two doses of a COVID vaccine.  Thank you to everyone who has made this possible.  Please keep coming forward to get your jabs to give yourself maximum protection from the virus. https://t.co/oZ1mm8DsVD
english: 15 million people across our United Kingdom have received two doses of a COVID vaccine.  Thank you to everyone who has made this possible.  Please keep coming forward to get your jabs to give yourself maximum protection from the virus. https://t.co/oZ1mm8DsVD

text: I know how challenging this time has been for those in care homes.    With data continuing to head in the right direction & as restrictions ease, I am pleased that from 4 May residents can now leave their homes to reunite with their loved ones outdoors.   https://t.co/48OMCCCWTQ https://t.co/zGmw5uMFcO
english: I know how challenging this time has been for those in care homes.    With data continuing to head in the right direction & as restrictions ease, I am pleased that from 4 May residents can now leave their homes to reunite with their loved ones outdoors.   https://t.co/48OMCCCWTQ https://t.co/zGmw5uMFcO

text: I’m very grateful to the postmasters who shared their harrowing stories with me yesterday about the terrible impact the Post Office Horizon IT dispute has had on their lives.   We will stand with them to find the answers to what went wrong and ensure this never happens again. https://t.co/bSQlT6qVxC
english: I’m very grateful to the postmasters who shared their harrowing stories with me yesterday about the terrible impact the Post Office Horizon IT dispute has had on their lives.   We will stand with them to find the answers to what went wrong and ensure this never happens again. https://t.co/bSQlT6qVxC

text: If you want to give London a fresh start, if you want safer streets and a mayor who backs the police then vote for @ShaunBaileyUK on Thursday 6th May. https://t.co/4WF7qBlHm7
english: If you want to give London a fresh start, if you want safer streets and a mayor who backs the police then vote for @ShaunBaileyUK on Thursday 6th May. https://t.co/4WF7qBlHm7

text: On what would have been @CaptainTomMoore’s 101st birthday, it’s brilliant to see the nation taking part in #CaptainTom100.   His astonishing life brought hope and joy to millions across the country, and raised an incredible £38.9 million for the NHS. https://t.co/cU9FmvRIs2
english: On what would have been @CaptainTomMoore’s 101st birthday, it’s brilliant to see the nation taking part in #CaptainTom100.   His astonishing life brought hope and joy to millions across the country, and raised an incredible £38.9 million for the NHS. https://t.co/cU9FmvRIs2

text: Devastating scenes at the Lag B'Omer festival in Israel. My thoughts are with the Israeli people and those who have lost loved ones in this tragedy.
english: Devastating scenes at the Lag B'Omer festival in Israel. My thoughts are with the Israeli people and those who have lost loved ones in this tragedy.

text: Last night I was delighted to join an Iftar with some of the many Muslim key workers and volunteers who have been helping us in the fight against COVID-19. https://t.co/WGzSxdxKv2
english: Last night I was delighted to join an Iftar with some of the many Muslim key workers and volunteers who have been helping us in the fight against COVID-19. https://t.co/WGzSxdxKv2

text: It’s fantastic to see young people back at school and seeing their friends again.   We’ve put children and young people at the heart of our recovery plans, and we will continue to give them all our support. https://t.co/bJBTpOk8nr
english: It’s fantastic to see young people back at school and seeing their friends again.   We’ve put children and young people at the heart of our recovery plans, and we will continue to give them all our support. https://t.co/bJBTpOk8nr

text: I'm proud to say we've recruited 8,771 new police officers in England and Wales, well ahead of our target of 6,000 more officers in the first year of our recruitment drive, and 20,000 over three years. https://t.co/FMWas20DKZ
english: I'm proud to say we've recruited 8,771 new police officers in England and Wales, well ahead of our target of 6,000 more officers in the first year of our recruitment drive, and 20,000 over three years. https://t.co/FMWas20DKZ

text: Our brilliant Vaccines Taskforce has secured an extra 60 million doses of the Pfizer/BioNTech vaccine. This is fantastic news and an important addition in keeping us protected into the autumn and winter. https://t.co/fGARe7h8Wi
english: Our brilliant Vaccines Taskforce has secured an extra 60 million doses of the Pfizer/BioNTech vaccine. This is fantastic news and an important addition in keeping us protected into the autumn and winter. https://t.co/fGARe7h8Wi

text: I want to thank Arlene Foster @DUPleader for her dedication to the people of Northern Ireland over many years. She will continue to play a vital role as First Minister until June and I hope that she stays in public service for years to come.
english: I want to thank Arlene Foster @DUPleader for her dedication to the people of Northern Ireland over many years. She will continue to play a vital role as First Minister until June and I hope that she stays in public service for years to come.

text: Great news that the European Parliament has voted overwhelmingly in favour of our zero tariffs, zero quotas Trade and Cooperation Agreement.   Now is the time to look forward to a new relationship with the EU and a more Global Britain.
english: Great news that the European Parliament has voted overwhelmingly in favour of our zero tariffs, zero quotas Trade and Cooperation Agreement.   Now is the time to look forward to a new relationship with the EU and a more Global Britain.

text: Vaccines have saved thousands of lives so far and now this data shows they could also protect others by cutting transmission of the virus – which will be crucial in helping us beat the pandemic.  I urge everyone to book their jab when called.  https://t.co/DOCoeFYjyC
english: Vaccines have saved thousands of lives so far and now this data shows they could also protect others by cutting transmission of the virus – which will be crucial in helping us beat the pandemic.  I urge everyone to book their jab when called.  https://t.co/DOCoeFYjyC

text: Dame Cheryl Gillan was a great servant to the people of Chesham & Amersham. She made a huge contribution to our party and country, and we will sorely miss her.  My thoughts are with her family and friends. https://t.co/CjSLQ6JsOg
english: Dame Cheryl Gillan was a great servant to the people of Chesham & Amersham. She made a huge contribution to our party and country, and we will sorely miss her.  My thoughts are with her family and friends. https://t.co/CjSLQ6JsOg

text: Today I spoke with President Kenyatta @StateHouseKenya ahead of the joint UK-Kenya Global Education Summit.  We agreed to work closely together to ensure 175 million more children get into school around the world. There’s a huge amount the  and  can achieve together.
english: Today I spoke with President Kenyatta @StateHouseKenya ahead of the joint UK-Kenya Global Education Summit.  We agreed to work closely together to ensure 175 million more children get into school around the world. There’s a huge amount the  and  can achieve together.

text: A quarter of UK adults have received 2 doses of a COVID vaccine, giving them maximum protection against the virus.   This is a huge achievement made possible by the tireless work of so many across our country.   Please keep coming forward to get vaccinated when you are called. https://t.co/yDPkehJJNV
english: A quarter of UK adults have received 2 doses of a COVID vaccine, giving them maximum protection against the virus.   This is a huge achievement made possible by the tireless work of so many across our country.   Please keep coming forward to get vaccinated when you are called. https://t.co/yDPkehJJNV

text: Fantastic news that 16,500 young people have now started jobs through our Kickstart scheme.   These fully-subsidised placements for 16 to 24-year-olds offer a vital first foot on the jobs ladder.   Find out more about the scheme and how to get involved: https://t.co/XYOPwZ1V61 https://t.co/EwaQixqzIY
english: Fantastic news that 16,500 young people have now started jobs through our Kickstart scheme.   These fully-subsidised placements for 16 to 24-year-olds offer a vital first foot on the jobs ladder.   Find out more about the scheme and how to get involved: https://t.co/XYOPwZ1V61 https://t.co/EwaQixqzIY

text: Fantastic to be in Wales today, campaigning with our @WelshConserv candidates.   The team have a plan to drive forward Wales' economic recovery, creating 65,000 new, well-paid jobs and investing in infrastructure like the A55.  Vote Conservative on May 6th. https://t.co/OKfslGXy5d
english: Fantastic to be in Wales today, campaigning with our @WelshConserv candidates.   The team have a plan to drive forward Wales' economic recovery, creating 65,000 new, well-paid jobs and investing in infrastructure like the A55.  Vote Conservative on May 6th. https://t.co/OKfslGXy5d

text: Iran's decision to sentence Nazanin Zaghari-Ratcliffe to another year in prison is cruel, inhumane and wholly unjustified. She must be allowed to return to her family in the UK and we will continue to do all we can to get her home.
english: Iran's decision to sentence Nazanin Zaghari-Ratcliffe to another year in prison is cruel, inhumane and wholly unjustified. She must be allowed to return to her family in the UK and we will continue to do all we can to get her home.

text: We stand side by side with India in the shared fight against COVID-19. Vital medical equipment is on its way from the UK to India to help stop the tragic loss of life from the virus and we’ll continue to work closely with the Indian government during this difficult time.
english: We stand side by side with India in the shared fight against COVID-19. Vital medical equipment is on its way from the UK to India to help stop the tragic loss of life from the virus and we’ll continue to work closely with the Indian government during this difficult time.

text: This is the story of the UK vaccine rollout which has already saved thousands of lives.  A huge thank you to everyone involved from the scientists, to our NHS, the Armed Forces and the many volunteers.   I urge everyone to take up the jab when you’re offered it. https://t.co/sXWzG952pG
english: This is the story of the UK vaccine rollout which has already saved thousands of lives.  A huge thank you to everyone involved from the scientists, to our NHS, the Armed Forces and the many volunteers.   I urge everyone to take up the jab when you’re offered it. https://t.co/sXWzG952pG

text: Today we pay our respects to the ANZACs who fought at Gallipoli, and remember all those who have fought with courage so that we may live in peace today. Their bravery, fortitude & spirit of mateship live on.    They will not be forgotten. #AnzacDay2021
english: Today we pay our respects to the ANZACs who fought at Gallipoli, and remember all those who have fought with courage so that we may live in peace today. Their bravery, fortitude & spirit of mateship live on.    They will not be forgotten. #AnzacDay2021

text: The UK is hosting a Global Education Summit this summer and leading efforts in our @G7 Presidency to get 40 million more girls into school.   I spoke to @Malala this morning about how girls education is one of the smartest investments countries can make as we build back better.
english: The UK is hosting a Global Education Summit this summer and leading efforts in our @G7 Presidency to get 40 million more girls into school.   I spoke to @Malala this morning about how girls education is one of the smartest investments countries can make as we build back better.

text: This is a landmark achievement by the team at @UniofOxford who developed the COVID-19 vaccine.   Malaria kills hundreds of thousands of children a year. An effective vaccine holds out the possibility of ending this global tragedy.   https://t.co/9ZiKfzO27s
english: This is a landmark achievement by the team at @UniofOxford who developed the COVID-19 vaccine.   Malaria kills hundreds of thousands of children a year. An effective vaccine holds out the possibility of ending this global tragedy.   https://t.co/9ZiKfzO27s

text: I welcome the Court of Appeal's decision to overturn the convictions of 39 former sub-postmasters in the Horizon dispute, an appalling injustice which has had a devastating impact on these families for years.  Lessons should and will be learnt to ensure this never happens again.
english: I welcome the Court of Appeal's decision to overturn the convictions of 39 former sub-postmasters in the Horizon dispute, an appalling injustice which has had a devastating impact on these families for years.  Lessons should and will be learnt to ensure this never happens again.

text: Happy St. George's Day! 󠁧󠁢󠁥󠁮󠁧󠁿 https://t.co/ivCHymH0UP
english: Happy St. George's Day! 󠁧󠁢󠁥󠁮󠁧󠁿 https://t.co/ivCHymH0UP

text: The world’s tropical forests are the lungs of our planet and yet we’re losing these great, teeming ecosystems at an unconscionable rate.    I’m pleased the UK is joining this hugely exciting coalition to protect our tropical forests and tackle climate change. https://t.co/qb65SDhXX9
english: The world’s tropical forests are the lungs of our planet and yet we’re losing these great, teeming ecosystems at an unconscionable rate.    I’m pleased the UK is joining this hugely exciting coalition to protect our tropical forests and tackle climate change. https://t.co/qb65SDhXX9

text: Our shared duty is to honour and remember all those, wherever they lived and whatever their background, who laid down their lives for our freedoms at the moment of greatest peril.  My statement on the Commonwealth War Graves Commission report. https://t.co/ft6LxGzGPh
english: Our shared duty is to honour and remember all those, wherever they lived and whatever their background, who laid down their lives for our freedoms at the moment of greatest peril.  My statement on the Commonwealth War Graves Commission report. https://t.co/ft6LxGzGPh

text: We can build back better from this pandemic by building back greener.   #LeadersClimateSummit https://t.co/Uu9Xc8gr6d
english: We can build back better from this pandemic by building back greener.   #LeadersClimateSummit https://t.co/Uu9Xc8gr6d

text: Let’s make this decade the moment of decisive change in the fight against climate change.   My statement at the #LeadersClimateSummit convened by @POTUS: https://t.co/HJhYmwRWMc  #BuildBackGreener | @COP26 | #EarthDay https://t.co/Ke1CXMUFmd
english: Let’s make this decade the moment of decisive change in the fight against climate change.   My statement at the #LeadersClimateSummit convened by @POTUS: https://t.co/HJhYmwRWMc  #BuildBackGreener | @COP26 | #EarthDay https://t.co/Ke1CXMUFmd

text: WATCH LIVE: My statement at the #LeadersClimateSummit convened by @POTUS https://t.co/wlpoFbvwcv
english: WATCH LIVE: My statement at the #LeadersClimateSummit convened by @POTUS https://t.co/wlpoFbvwcv

text: The commitment from @POTUS today to cut US emissions by 50-52% by 2030 is a game-changer. It will have a transformative impact in the global fight against climate change.   I commend the President's leadership and look forward to working together for our planet ahead of @COP26.
english: The commitment from @POTUS today to cut US emissions by 50-52% by 2030 is a game-changer. It will have a transformative impact in the global fight against climate change.   I commend the President's leadership and look forward to working together for our planet ahead of @COP26.

text: In supporting #StephenLawrenceDay we are reminded of Stephen's many talents, and our duty to stop racism and give young people the best possible future.   My thoughts are with Stephen’s parents Doreen and Neville, and the many families that have lost loved ones in their prime.
english: In supporting #StephenLawrenceDay we are reminded of Stephen's many talents, and our duty to stop racism and give young people the best possible future.   My thoughts are with Stephen’s parents Doreen and Neville, and the many families that have lost loved ones in their prime.

text: We've reached a significant milestone with 1 in 5 adults now having had two COVID-19 vaccine doses. This is a huge UK-wide effort that has already saved thousands of lives.   Thank you to everyone involved. https://t.co/pGoSpyMC1O
english: We've reached a significant milestone with 1 in 5 adults now having had two COVID-19 vaccine doses. This is a huge UK-wide effort that has already saved thousands of lives.   Thank you to everyone involved. https://t.co/pGoSpyMC1O

text: I would like to send my warm wishes to Her Majesty The Queen on her 95th birthday.  I have always had the highest admiration for Her Majesty and her service to this country and the Commonwealth.  I am proud to serve as her Prime Minister.
english: I would like to send my warm wishes to Her Majesty The Queen on her 95th birthday.  I have always had the highest admiration for Her Majesty and her service to this country and the Commonwealth.  I am proud to serve as her Prime Minister.

text: I welcome last night’s announcement. This is the right result for football fans, clubs, and communities across the country. We must continue to protect our cherished national game.
english: I welcome last night’s announcement. This is the right result for football fans, clubs, and communities across the country. We must continue to protect our cherished national game.

text: I was appalled by the death of George Floyd and welcome this verdict.  My thoughts tonight are with George Floyd’s family and friends.
english: I was appalled by the death of George Floyd and welcome this verdict.  My thoughts tonight are with George Floyd’s family and friends.

text: The decision by Chelsea and Manchester City is – if confirmed – absolutely the right one and I commend them for it.  I hope the other clubs involved in the European Super League will follow their lead.
english: The decision by Chelsea and Manchester City is – if confirmed – absolutely the right one and I commend them for it.  I hope the other clubs involved in the European Super League will follow their lead.

text: The vaccination programme has shown what the UK can achieve when we bring together our brightest minds.   Our new Antivirals Taskforce will seek to provide another vital defence against any future increase in infections, saving more lives. https://t.co/VpGnxPr6bf
english: The vaccination programme has shown what the UK can achieve when we bring together our brightest minds.   Our new Antivirals Taskforce will seek to provide another vital defence against any future increase in infections, saving more lives. https://t.co/VpGnxPr6bf

text: WATCH LIVE: An update on coronavirus (20 April 2021) https://t.co/sj7DxbLrGT
english: WATCH LIVE: An update on coronavirus (20 April 2021) https://t.co/sj7DxbLrGT

text: We’re setting the most ambitious target to cut emissions in the world.   We want to see world leaders follow our lead in the run up to @COP26, as we will only build back greener and protect our planet if we come together to take action. https://t.co/EvQhLDGbEx
english: We’re setting the most ambitious target to cut emissions in the world.   We want to see world leaders follow our lead in the run up to @COP26, as we will only build back greener and protect our planet if we come together to take action. https://t.co/EvQhLDGbEx

text: Earlier @OliverDowden and I met with representatives from the @FA, @PremierLeague and football fan groups to discuss action against the proposed European Super League.    No action is off the table and we are exploring every possibility to ensure these proposals are stopped. https://t.co/QZMGRnXDcF
english: Earlier @OliverDowden and I met with representatives from the @FA, @PremierLeague and football fan groups to discuss action against the proposed European Super League.    No action is off the table and we are exploring every possibility to ensure these proposals are stopped. https://t.co/QZMGRnXDcF

text: It’s fantastic that we’ve been able to enjoy some more freedoms with family and friends since 12 April.  As we continue with our cautious roadmap, please follow the rules and remember hands, face, space and fresh air. https://t.co/qdqBlX7K5l
english: It’s fantastic that we’ve been able to enjoy some more freedoms with family and friends since 12 April.  As we continue with our cautious roadmap, please follow the rules and remember hands, face, space and fresh air. https://t.co/qdqBlX7K5l

text: Great to be back at the pub again, and to see so many reunited with friends and family.    We’ve worked so hard to get to this point. Let’s keep going. Remember hands, face, space & fresh air. https://t.co/g3ApAkpNNM
english: Great to be back at the pub again, and to see so many reunited with friends and family.    We’ve worked so hard to get to this point. Let’s keep going. Remember hands, face, space & fresh air. https://t.co/g3ApAkpNNM

text: Plans for a European Super League would be very damaging for football and we support football authorities in taking action.   They would strike at the heart of the domestic game, and will concern fans across the country. (1/2)
english: Plans for a European Super League would be very damaging for football and we support football authorities in taking action.   They would strike at the heart of the domestic game, and will concern fans across the country. (1/2)

text: In Memoriam HRH The Prince Philip, Duke of Edinburgh, 1921-2021. https://t.co/QoKgxOYnt5
english: In Memoriam HRH The Prince Philip, Duke of Edinburgh, 1921-2021. https://t.co/QoKgxOYnt5

text: HRH The Duke of Edinburgh incarnated the finest traditions of the @RoyalNavy.   Today I saw cadets become officers at Britannia Royal Naval College, Dartmouth, the college The Duke passed out of prior to his distinguished naval career.   Our thoughts remain with HM The Queen. https://t.co/ANHtrpD2Y4
english: HRH The Duke of Edinburgh incarnated the finest traditions of the @RoyalNavy.   Today I saw cadets become officers at Britannia Royal Naval College, Dartmouth, the college The Duke passed out of prior to his distinguished naval career.   Our thoughts remain with HM The Queen. https://t.co/ANHtrpD2Y4

text: Happy Vaisakhi to Sikhs in Britain and around the world.   #Vaisakhi signals hope and renewal, and as we look ahead – cautiously but optimistically – to what the coming months may bring, I want to say a huge thank you to Sikhs for your forbearance and fortitude. https://t.co/RAByjFfIZb
english: Happy Vaisakhi to Sikhs in Britain and around the world.   #Vaisakhi signals hope and renewal, and as we look ahead – cautiously but optimistically – to what the coming months may bring, I want to say a huge thank you to Sikhs for your forbearance and fortitude. https://t.co/RAByjFfIZb

text: Congratulations to @JoeMurphyLondon on a well-earned retirement after a spectacular innings in the lobby.   You were always as fair and as kind as you could be under the circumstances.  I wish you all the best for the future.
english: Congratulations to @JoeMurphyLondon on a well-earned retirement after a spectacular innings in the lobby.   You were always as fair and as kind as you could be under the circumstances.  I wish you all the best for the future.

text: We have hit a hugely significant milestone by offering jabs to everyone in the nine highest risk groups, giving them the protection vaccines provide against COVID-19.   I want to thank everyone involved in the vaccine rollout, which has already saved many thousands of lives. https://t.co/VQWo9axoLG
english: We have hit a hugely significant milestone by offering jabs to everyone in the nine highest risk groups, giving them the protection vaccines provide against COVID-19.   I want to thank everyone involved in the vaccine rollout, which has already saved many thousands of lives. https://t.co/VQWo9axoLG

text: Ramadan Mubarak to all those observing Islam’s holiest month this year.    I’m afraid that again this year it is necessary to follow the rules to stay safe but I hope this month of fast, prayer and charity brings much peace and reflection to all Muslims.
english: Ramadan Mubarak to all those observing Islam’s holiest month this year.    I’m afraid that again this year it is necessary to follow the rules to stay safe but I hope this month of fast, prayer and charity brings much peace and reflection to all Muslims.

text: Earlier I paid tribute to HRH The Prince Philip, Duke of Edinburgh in the @HouseOfCommons.   The Duke's unstinting service gives us all a model of selflessness and of putting others before ourselves. https://t.co/Tq9lH2up3I
english: Earlier I paid tribute to HRH The Prince Philip, Duke of Edinburgh in the @HouseOfCommons.   The Duke's unstinting service gives us all a model of selflessness and of putting others before ourselves. https://t.co/Tq9lH2up3I

text: Sad to hear about Baroness Shirley Williams, a kind and thoughtful member of the once radical centre left. Even when we disagreed - as we often did - she had the gift of sounding so completely reasonable at all times. (1/2)
english: Sad to hear about Baroness Shirley Williams, a kind and thoughtful member of the once radical centre left. Even when we disagreed - as we often did - she had the gift of sounding so completely reasonable at all times. (1/2)

text: Yesterday was a record-breaking day with 475,230 people receiving second doses. More than 7 million have now been fully vaccinated.   Thanks to everyone involved in this extraordinary effort which has already saved thousands of lives.
english: Yesterday was a record-breaking day with 475,230 people receiving second doses. More than 7 million have now been fully vaccinated.   Thanks to everyone involved in this extraordinary effort which has already saved thousands of lives.

text: Today is ten years since the death of my friend Sir Simon Milton, an outstanding servant of London and of his country. We miss you, Simon.
english: Today is ten years since the death of my friend Sir Simon Milton, an outstanding servant of London and of his country. We miss you, Simon.

text: My statement on the death of HRH The Prince Philip, Duke of Edinburgh. https://t.co/cjlSsERXPV
english: My statement on the death of HRH The Prince Philip, Duke of Edinburgh. https://t.co/cjlSsERXPV

text: On the death of HRH The Prince Philip, Duke of Edinburgh. https://t.co/rZlbY1matF
english: On the death of HRH The Prince Philip, Duke of Edinburgh. https://t.co/rZlbY1matF

text: The science is clear: vaccines save lives.    New @PHE_UK analysis shows COVID-19 vaccinations have prevented over 10,000 deaths.   It’s important that you book your jab when the NHS contacts you.  ➡️ https://t.co/YxlPKeUKn5 https://t.co/R7SQ3xIp1R
english: The science is clear: vaccines save lives.    New @PHE_UK analysis shows COVID-19 vaccinations have prevented over 10,000 deaths.   It’s important that you book your jab when the NHS contacts you.  ➡️ https://t.co/YxlPKeUKn5 https://t.co/R7SQ3xIp1R

text: Last night in Truro I saw the outstanding work of doctors and nurses at the Royal Cornwall Hospital. Thank you to the entire team and the whole of our NHS  https://t.co/bKGVSWeaaJ
english: Last night in Truro I saw the outstanding work of doctors and nurses at the Royal Cornwall Hospital. Thank you to the entire team and the whole of our NHS  https://t.co/bKGVSWeaaJ

text: 6 million people have now had their second jab.  Yesterday over 400,000 second doses were given.  A huge thank you to everyone helping to make this happen – it is an incredible achievement that has already saved thousands of lives.
english: 6 million people have now had their second jab.  Yesterday over 400,000 second doses were given.  A huge thank you to everyone helping to make this happen – it is an incredible achievement that has already saved thousands of lives.

text: It was fantastic to meet with businesses in Cornwall to hear how they are preparing to reopen and welcome customers back on Monday.  The next stage in our roadmap is a significant step towards reclaiming the freedoms COVID has taken from us. https://t.co/s7Ry99TIsX
english: It was fantastic to meet with businesses in Cornwall to hear how they are preparing to reopen and welcome customers back on Monday.  The next stage in our roadmap is a significant step towards reclaiming the freedoms COVID has taken from us. https://t.co/s7Ry99TIsX

text: Sad to hear about the loss of Peter Ainsworth - a delightful colleague & passionate about his causes, especially the environment. We shared a corridor & often found ourselves charging late for the division. He has been taken far too young. My thoughts with Claire & their family.
english: Sad to hear about the loss of Peter Ainsworth - a delightful colleague & passionate about his causes, especially the environment. We shared a corridor & often found ourselves charging late for the division. He has been taken far too young. My thoughts with Claire & their family.

text: I am deeply concerned by the scenes of violence in Northern Ireland, especially attacks on PSNI who are protecting the public and businesses, attacks on a bus driver and the assault of a journalist. The way to resolve differences is through dialogue, not violence or criminality.
english: I am deeply concerned by the scenes of violence in Northern Ireland, especially attacks on PSNI who are protecting the public and businesses, attacks on a bus driver and the assault of a journalist. The way to resolve differences is through dialogue, not violence or criminality.

text: We set out our roadmap and we’re sticking to it.   Thanks to your efforts and the vaccine rollout, from Monday we will move to Step Two of our roadmap – reopening shops, gyms, hairdressers and outdoor hospitality of all kinds. https://t.co/LJojqMpAuY
english: We set out our roadmap and we’re sticking to it.   Thanks to your efforts and the vaccine rollout, from Monday we will move to Step Two of our roadmap – reopening shops, gyms, hairdressers and outdoor hospitality of all kinds. https://t.co/LJojqMpAuY

text: Thank you @MHRAgovuk and JCVI for your important work looking at the AstraZeneca vaccine, which has updated on the potential for extremely rare side effects. 1/3
english: Thank you @MHRAgovuk and JCVI for your important work looking at the AstraZeneca vaccine, which has updated on the potential for extremely rare side effects. 1/3

text: The Moderna vaccine rollout begins today, starting with Carmarthen in Wales. We have ordered 17 million doses that will be going into arms across the UK in the coming weeks.  Please get your jab as soon as you are contacted.  https://t.co/i9fAMASKD3
english: The Moderna vaccine rollout begins today, starting with Carmarthen in Wales. We have ordered 17 million doses that will be going into arms across the UK in the coming weeks.  Please get your jab as soon as you are contacted.  https://t.co/i9fAMASKD3

text: .@AstraZeneca has been at the heart of our fight against coronavirus, and they are also playing a big part in our efforts to #BuildBackBetter from the pandemic and make the UK a science superpower. https://t.co/3TtBKzv80x

If it is successful and meets our robust safety standards this vaccine will be manufactured in Scotland, providing a crucial weapon in our battle against COVID. https://t.co/Xr79bIGsmS

text: I spoke to President Zelenskyy @ZelenskyyUa this evening regarding our concerns about destabilising Russian military activity on Ukraine’s border.  I reiterated the UK’s unwavering support for Ukraine’s sovereignty and territorial integrity.
english: I spoke to President Zelenskyy @ZelenskyyUa this evening regarding our concerns about destabilising Russian military activity on Ukraine’s border.  I reiterated the UK’s unwavering support for Ukraine’s sovereignty and territorial integrity.

text: We set out our roadmap and we’re sticking to it.  It is by being cautious, by monitoring the data at every stage, and by following the rules – remembering hands, face, space and fresh air – that we hope together to make this roadmap to freedom irreversible. https://t.co/EQM74Muu3p
english: We set out our roadmap and we’re sticking to it.  It is by being cautious, by monitoring the data at every stage, and by following the rules – remembering hands, face, space and fresh air – that we hope together to make this roadmap to freedom irreversible. https://t.co/EQM74Muu3p

english: WATCH LIVE: An update on COVID-19 (5 April 2021) https://t.co/7MwrBSklfm

text: I’m very sad to hear the news of the death of Dame Cheryl Gillan.   She was a great servant to the people of Chesham and Amersham, to the Conservative Party and to the country as Secretary of State for Wales. (1/2)
english: I’m very sad to hear the news of the death of Dame Cheryl Gillan.   She was a great servant to the people of Chesham and Amersham, to the Conservative Party and to the country as Secretary of State for Wales. (1/2)

text: The arrival of Easter brings with it new hope.  And, this year more than ever, it brings the promise of brighter days ahead for us all.  So stay safe, keep following the rules, and have a very happy Easter. https://t.co/BQs4oCn57N
english: The arrival of Easter brings with it new hope.  And, this year more than ever, it brings the promise of brighter days ahead for us all.  So stay safe, keep following the rules, and have a very happy Easter. https://t.co/BQs4oCn57N

text: We've reached another milestone in our vaccination programme with over 5 million people now having had their second jab.   I urge everyone to take up their second dose as soon as they are offered it.
english: We've reached another milestone in our vaccination programme with over 5 million people now having had their second jab.   I urge everyone to take up their second dose as soon as they are offered it.

text: This Easter weekend, please remember that outdoors is generally much safer than indoors.   If you’re in England and seeing friends and family outside, keep to groups of up to six people or two households.   Let’s keep each other safe as we continue with the vaccination rollout.
english: This Easter weekend, please remember that outdoors is generally much safer than indoors.   If you’re in England and seeing friends and family outside, keep to groups of up to six people or two households.   Let’s keep each other safe as we continue with the vaccination rollout.

english: I answered some of your questions about our cautious, irreversible roadmap to freedom.  Keep sending your questions in to https://t.co/FBynuacYFP https://t.co/d5Dlb4PhVz

english: Ahead of outdoor organised sport returning across England tomorrow, good luck to everyone getting back to the sports you love – from football to netball and much more.   After a difficult few months, it’s great that so many will be able to get back out there. https://t.co/dPED46vpPp

text: We’re investing £500m in mental health services, which will expand NHS talking therapies to an additional 1.6 million people.    We recognise the impact this pandemic has had on wellbeing and are dedicated to providing better mental health support for those in need. https://t.co/lN4XatF4Sq
english: We’re investing £500m in mental health services, which will expand NHS talking therapies to an additional 1.6 million people.    We recognise the impact this pandemic has had on wellbeing and are dedicated to providing better mental health support for those in need. https://t.co/lN4XatF4Sq

text: This morning I spoke with some of those who have been shining a light on the gross human rights violations being perpetrated against Uyghur Muslims.  I stand firmly with them and the other British citizens sanctioned by China. https://t.co/WsQ3XvAedP
english: This morning I spoke with some of those who have been shining a light on the gross human rights violations being perpetrated against Uyghur Muslims.  I stand firmly with them and the other British citizens sanctioned by China. https://t.co/WsQ3XvAedP

text: Last night saw disgraceful attacks against police officers in Bristol.   Our officers should not have to face having bricks, bottles and fireworks being thrown at them by a mob intent on violence and causing damage to property.  The police and the city have my full support.
english: Last night saw disgraceful attacks against police officers in Bristol.   Our officers should not have to face having bricks, bottles and fireworks being thrown at them by a mob intent on violence and causing damage to property.  The police and the city have my full support.

text: Chag kasher v’sameach to everyone celebrating #Passover.  While families, friends and neighbours can't come together as they usually would, I know our fantastic Jewish community - known for its strength and resilience – will celebrate this Pesach safely. https://t.co/lQfCIDZV2K
english: Chag kasher v’sameach to everyone celebrating #Passover.  While families, friends and neighbours can't come together as they usually would, I know our fantastic Jewish community - known for its strength and resilience – will celebrate this Pesach safely. https://t.co/lQfCIDZV2K

text: I want to congratulate the people of Bangladesh on your 50th anniversary.   The bond between our two nations is incarnated by the 600,000 strong British-Bangladeshi community, who contribute so much to our country   #Bangladesh50 #BritBanglaBondhon https://t.co/kIw0BSFWtF
english: I want to congratulate the people of Bangladesh on your 50th anniversary.   The bond between our two nations is incarnated by the 600,000 strong British-Bangladeshi community, who contribute so much to our country   #Bangladesh50 #BritBanglaBondhon https://t.co/kIw0BSFWtF

text: The MPs and other British citizens sanctioned by China today are performing a vital role shining a light on the gross human rights violations being perpetrated against Uyghur Muslims.   Freedom to speak out in opposition to abuse is fundamental and I stand firmly with them.
english: The MPs and other British citizens sanctioned by China today are performing a vital role shining a light on the gross human rights violations being perpetrated against Uyghur Muslims.   Freedom to speak out in opposition to abuse is fundamental and I stand firmly with them.

english: Best wishes to the people of Greece on the 200th anniversary of the Greek Revolution. The UK was proud to play its part in the establishment of the modern Greek state and I greatly value the friendship that exists between our people today

english: Fantastic to visit @BAESystemsplc in Warton.   Our £24bn investment in security and defence will modernise our Armed Forces, creating jobs and securing our place as a science superpower. https://t.co/lNInD0ibT7

text: Yesterday was a record-breaking day for the vaccine rollout, with 873,784 people receiving a jab.   A huge thank you to everyone involved and please come forward to get your jab when you are invited to do so.
english: Yesterday was a record-breaking day for the vaccine rollout, with 873,784 people receiving a jab.   A huge thank you to everyone involved and please come forward to get your jab when you are invited to do so.

text: More than half the adult population of the UK have now received their first jab.   Many thanks to everyone involved in this fantastic achievement. Let’s keep going! https://t.co/cf9kWThmuM
english: More than half the adult population of the UK have now received their first jab.   Many thanks to everyone involved in this fantastic achievement. Let’s keep going! https://t.co/cf9kWThmuM

text: I've just received my first Oxford/AstraZeneca vaccine dose.  Thank you to all of the incredible scientists, NHS staff and volunteers who helped make this happen.  Getting the jab is the best thing we can do to get back to the lives we miss so much.  Let's get the jab done. https://t.co/mQCTMAkB8d

english: Spoke to @MarkRutte this afternoon to congratulate him on his re-election. The UK and the Netherlands will continue to be close partners and I look forward to working with Mark in the coming years

english: The sheer endurance and determination of @BillyMonger in his 140 mile challenge for @ComicRelief is an inspiration to us all.   Thank you Billy and everyone who is supporting this important cause.   #RedNoseDay https://t.co/UP8YLJDcXH

text: The Oxford/AstraZeneca jab is safe and the Pfizer jab is safe - the thing that isn’t safe is catching COVID.   Which is why it’s so important that we all get our jabs as soon as our turn comes. https://t.co/WREOjG4FIX
